details: This course images the basics of Python programming language, including variables, loops, functions, and data structures.
Learn the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build your first website from scratch.
An introductory course to machine learning algorithms and techniques. images supervised and unsupervised learning.
Learn the essentials of graphic design, including typography, color theory, and layout design.
Explore various digital marketing strategies, including SEO, social media marketing, and email campaigns.
An introductory course to data science, imageing data analysis, visualization, and basic machine learning concepts.
Learn the basics of financial planning, including budgeting, saving, and investing for the future.
Master the art of photography, from understanding your camera to advanced composition techniques.
Unlock your creativity with this workshop on creative writing. Learn storytelling techniques and how to develop compelling characters.
